item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 6:50, so let's meet by 6:30 outside the theater. Then we'll go in and buy our tix and goodies and choose our seats.

If you haven't already RSVPed, please do so I know who to wait for!

OLD STUFF:
Let's go see a truly 3-D movie, from beginning to end! Brendan Fraser is a superhero this summer w/ the Mummy 3 and Journey. We have to wait a bit for Mummy, but we can relive the classic Jules Verne story on July 24!

I'll update the time next week, as showtimes don't come out this far ahead.

Let's meet outside the theater before the show and I'll buy our discounted tickets.

Feel free to bring friends! Just be sure to include them in your RSVP so I know how many people to expect.

We'll hit Friday's or somewhere of similar ilk after the show, if everyone's up for it.

Hope to see you next week!

--Dana
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be outside the theater waiting for you! I look like my picture.
item.name: Journey to the Center of the Earth
